data.comment: The match has started, with Swansea kicking-off.
Goal! Matt Grimes gives Swansea a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 33, Ryan Bennett (Swansea) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Rotherham's Daniel Barlaser has been booked in Swansea.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Rotherham with the kick-off.
Trevor Clarke is on a sub for Matthew Olosunde for Rotherham.
Paul Warne is making the team's second substitution at Liberty Stadium with Mikel Miller replacing Jamie Lindsay.
In the minute 53, Michael Smith is replacing George Hirst for the away team.
Paul Warne (Rotherham) is making a fourth substitution, with Kyle Vassell replacing Florian Jozefzoon.
Wayne Routledge is replacing Liam Cullen for Swansea at Liberty Stadium.
In the minute 77, Swansea make their second substitution with Kasey Palmer replacing Yan Dhanda.
The home team replace Jamal Lowe with Korey Smith.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
